I am glad to have run into you, <player>. %quester6% has been asking around for you - I think she has some news to share. I will let her know where you are, and send her to meet you on your travels soon.
Be on the lookout for %quester6%, who has some news to share.

I am glad to have run into you, <player>. %quester6% has been asking around for you - I think she has some news to share. I will let her know where you are, and send her to meet you on your travels soon.
Be on the lookout for %quester6%, who has some news to share.

Hello, <player>. You are building quite the empire, and I have some good news for you. In my travels, I have come across the Baumeister recipe for %dark_truffles%. These are my cousin Deiter's favorites. Would you be willing to bring 5 cases to him at %istshop%?
Bring 5 cases of %dark_truffles% to %quester6%'s cousin in %istanbul%.
My cousin told me that you would be arriving with Truffles?

%dark_truffles% made from our family recipe! Unbelievable!
Once you step inside, I'll be more than happy to buy them all!
Listen. My fiancee, %quester%, is out traveling, sourcing products for our shop. If you come across her in your travels, would you mind delivering this package to her for me?
A package from Deiter? Let me see what you have there....

OK, I'm going to level with you. Deiter and I have been looking for someone to take over our shop. I have 3 recipes here - for %milk_truffles%, %caramel_truffles%, and %mint_choco_truffles%. If you make 36 cases of each of these recipes, and deliver them to Deiter's brother Felix in %trinidad%, the shop will be yours. Deal?
Deliver 36 cases each of %milk_truffles%, %caramel_truffles%, and %mint_choco_truffles% to %trinidad%.
What I wouldn't do for 108 cases of a variety of Truffles!

<player>, you have no idea what these cases of chocolates mean to me and my family. You are succeeding where so many before you have failed. The shop in Istanbul is now yours. It seems almost as if Baumesiter Confections is rising again. Now if only there was some way to reconcile my sisters....

I have been hearing nothing but good things about you, my friend. I believe I have some information that you might find quite interesting. I would be happy to share it. What do you say you take this recipe for %coconut_lemon_truffles% and make me 50 cases? I will find you in your travels, pay you well for the confections, and also spill some beans, as they say...
%quester2% will find you in your travels, you just need to have those 50 cases of %coconut_lemon_truffles% ready for him...
Splendid. Here is $20,000 for your efforts. Now, about the information....

It appears that Rowena and Grimaldo are having some troubles. As you may have surmised, it has been Grimaldo causing so many problems for all these years. I think things are finally catching up to him. Anyhow, stop by to see %sfsalooner% next time you're in %sanfrancisco%. A case or two of those %coconut_lemon_truffles% might just loosen his tongue...
Bring a case of %coconut_lemon_truffles% to %sfsalooner% when you're next in %sanfrancisco%.
I think it will be worth your while to hear some information from %sfsalooner%. If you'll bring him a case of %coconut_lemon_truffles%, I'm pretty sure he'll fill you in on some details...
Bring a case of %coconut_lemon_truffles% to %sfsalooner% in %sanfrancisco%.
I do love %coconut_lemon_truffles%, of that there is no doubt....

%coconut_lemon_truffles%? Now these are some fine chocolates. These remind me of a picnic, many years ago. I asked Evangeline's hand in marriage. Then, and I believe up until this very day, she has had just one true love: %hkpeakkeep%.
From what I heard, it was %villain% who came between them. If only they could both just see the truth....
%mahashopkeep% would like a word with you, <player>. Will you go speak with him in %mahajanga%?
Thank you for coming, <player>. There are two things I wanted to speak with you about. First, I recently discovered the recipe for %almond_choco_truffles%, and I wanted you to have it.
Second, I want to ask you to take a letter to %trinparkkeep%. This is a note to Rowena from %villain%. I think it might help shed some light on what has been going on for so many years...
Bring the note you received from %mahashopkeep% to %trinparkkeep%.

This note you bring, it is for real? I suspected this all along, that Grimaldo was behind everything. But this is proof - poor Rowena! I must have a word with Evangeline. Thank you, <player>, for bringing this to my attention.
My fiancee would like to ask you a favor, <player>. Please do be sure to visit him at your shop in %istanbul% at your earliest convenience. Thank you.
Visit your shop in %istanbul% at your earliest convenience.
This is your shop now, <player>, you are most welcome. When you've finished inside, I'd like to ask you a favor....

I'd like you to bring some chocolates to %hkpeakkeep%. With so much that has come to light of late, it may be time to try to reconcile those two, and this might just be a way to start. Here's a recipe for %trin_almond_vanilla_truffles%. Will you bring him a dozen cases?
Oh, just imagining %trin_almond_vanilla_truffles% is making my mouth water....

These chocolates you have given me, they bring a tear to my eye. These were the first chocolates Evangeline ever made for us - I remember the day like it was yesterday. Thank you so much, <player>. I trust that our paths will cross again someday...

I've heard tales of your marvelous %trin_almond_vanilla_truffles%. I tell you what. I'll start looking for you in 8 weeks time. If you've got 48 cases when we cross paths, I'll trade for an extremely valuable recipe I've got in my possession. What do you say?
Have 48 cases of %trin_almond_vanilla_truffles%. ready to trade with %quester5%.
I'm still holding on to these recipes for you...
Excellent! I look forward to enjoying these sweets, and I am sure this recipe for %sula_lemon_macadamia_truffles% will bring you good profits.
%hkpeakkeep% would like an audience with you, <player>. He sent me to ask you to call on him in %hongkong% as soon as you are free...
Call on %hkpeakkeep% in %hongkong% as soon as you are free.

Life is short, <player>. I need Evangeline; I have decided that I must at least try. You have helped me see the light. I have one of their family recipes, for %coffee_cinnamon_truffles%. If these won't get my message across, I don't know what will. Take 12 cases to Evangeline. I will be forever in your debt.
Was it my imagination, or did I hear that Jarrah asked you to bring something to me?
Oh, my heart hurts! <player>, never in my wildest dreams would I have imagined that I might be reunited with my true love Jarrah. Through chocolate, love conquers all!

Hello, <player>. I hope that owning a Chocolate Shop has proved a worthwhile investment for you. I recently heard that the owner of %colshop% in %colombo% might be interested in entertaining an offer soon...
Stop by and chat with %colshopkeep% when next in %colombo%.

<player>, I understand that you have done well with your shop in %merida%. I am a cousin to the Baumeister Confections clan, and have acquired a recipe or two myself. If you agree to make some confections with my recipes, and deliver them to some folks for me, I just might be willing to do you a good turn. Interested?

That's good news. Let's start with my recipe for %colo_raspberry_infusion%. You can get the special beans you need from my sister %colfarmer%. She and I came to Sri Lanka together. Buy the beans from her, and bring me 25 cases when you've got them produced.
Make 25 cases of %colo_raspberry_infusion% and bring them to %colshopkeep%.

You have done well. I am going to give you 500 sacks of my sister's finest beans for those 25 cases. You know, Rowena is our first cousin, and I knew her as a child. It is hard for me to reconcile the girl I knew then with some of the stories one hears. I wonder if there is not something else going on? Anyway, stop by again next time you're in town...

My uncle Hieronymus started Baumeister Confections, so I guess chocolate runs in my blood. I am cultivating the finest Colombo Cacao here, and I look forward to tasting the %colo_raspberry_infusion% you will make with my beans.
%colshopkeep% has a favor to ask of you, <player>. See her in %colombo% as soon as you can.

Your %colo_raspberry_infusion% really do remind me of visiting the Baumeisters. We would all love to go see them in Sydney and tour the factory. I have an idea. Why don't you bring 25 cases to %sftutor%? Give them to her with my compliments - do not worry, I will compensate you for your efforts...
I had word from %colshopkeep% that you might arrive with a gift for me?

A gift of %colo_raspberry_infusion% from my cousin %colshopkeep%? These remind me of our summers together, before all of this ridiculous mess with my sister. I do sometimes wonder how Rowena is getting along. Listen, please give this note to %colshopkeep% the next time you find yourself in %colombo%.
Don't forget to deliver Evangeline's note to %colshopkeep% in %colombo%.

%colshopkeep% is looking for you. Do you not have a note to deliver from her cousin Evangeline?

Go see her in %colombo% at your earliest convenience.

A note from my cousin? Well, it appears that my gesture was appreciated. Thank you, <player>. I would like to have a word with my eldest sister, %quester6%. She is constantly on the go - if you run into her on your travels, will you please ask her to stop by Sri Lanka and see me?

%colshopkeep% has sent for me? I guess I am due for a visit. Is this about Rowena and Evangeline? My little sister, bless her heart, is certainly a romantic. I only hope that she's not going to wind up disappointed once again...

My sister %quester6% just stopped by, thank you for delivering my message. There are 6 of us in my family - all girls. Candace, in %quito%, is a well-known guide and naturalist. Be sure to pay her a visit next time you are in her neck of the woods.
My sisters and I, we are all close. %quester6% was here recently. We are all very happy with what you are up to.

In my travels on the islands, I have come across a recipe for %quito_coffee_infusion%. These are made exclusively with %quito_cacao%. Manufacture 100 cases, and find %quester% - she's Deiter Baumeister's fiancee, and travels the world sourcing chocolates for his shop.
Have 100 cases of %quito_coffee_infusion% on hand for %quester%.
My fiancee is a Baumeister. We have recipes. For 100 cases of those %quito_coffee_infusion% my cousin told me about, I think we can work a nice trade.
Don't worry, %quester% will find you. Just be sure you've got the goods together in order to make the trade.
You have the confections? Wonderful. I am sure these will sell quite nicely in our shop. Here is one of the recipes I spoke to you about. And do be sure to call on %colshopkeep% soon...
Be sure and call on %colshopkeep% when next in %colombo%.

%colshopkeep% would like to see you, .

Go speak with her in %colombo% at your earliest convenience.
Welcome once again, <player>. You have really done well by me, and I promised to reward you appropriately.

This shop is now yours. I will offer you the highest prices for your goods in this part of the world. I look forward to seeing more of you in the future. By the way, I think we may be making progress with those sisters...
I understand you have the recipe for %maha_mint_raspberry_infusion%? If you bring me 28 cases, I'll hand over a spectacular recipe that I have got here with me. Deal?
Bring 28 cases of %maha_mint_raspberry_infusion% to trade with %hksaloonkeep%.
If you've got some things for %hksaloonkeep%, you should be able to find her in %hongkong%.
Excellent. Here is the recipe - for %raspberry_infusion%. Pleasure doing business with you.
I am a distant cousin to the chocolate-making Baumeisters. It gives me great pleasure to know that the old family recipes are being put to good use.
Have you met my sister over at %sulashop%? She runs the finest shop in all of Indonesia, and sources her goods from all over the world.
Do you recall that I was the one to give you the recipe for %sula_macadamia_infusion%? As soon as you've got a case for me, I will honor my promise to you with yet another recipe.
As soon as you've got a case of %sula_macadamia_infusion% for me, I will honor my promise to you with yet another recipe.

Oh, the %sula_macadamia_infusion% you have made are simply delectable. I will take 1 case off of your hands, and in return I will make a gift to you of the Baumeister recipe for %vanilla_almond_infusion%.
You may recall that a while back I handed you the Baumeister recipe for %colo_coffee_almond_infusion%. If you will bring me 45 cases of the same, I will give you a most valuable recipe. Interested?
I've got the recipe; have you got the chocolates?
My chocolates - excellent! Here, as I promised, is a most valuable recipe - for %maha_cinnamon_cherry_truffles%. Enjoy!
I have a message from %sftutor%. She would like to see you at your earliest convenience.

I have learned a lot since last we spoke, <player>. I need you to go to %sydney%. I think that my sister may be prepared to forgive me. I want you to take a case of her favorite chocolates - %hazelnut_milk_truffles% - to her.
Bring a peace offering of one case of %hazelnut_milk_truffles% to %sydshopkeep% in %sydney%.
Is it true that my sister has agreed to speak with me?

Oh, <player>. I can not tell you how lonely I have been, how much I have missed my sister. Life with Grimaldo was pure hell. That is over now, and I am ready to make peace with my family, whom I have horribly mistreated. Let me tell you my plan...

In our family, it all boils down to chocolates, and I think I have a way to make amends. I want you to deliver 50 cases each of their favorite confections to Felix, Deiter, Jarrah and Evangeline. The only problem is the recipes - I've sold them off, and I'm afraid you'll have to do some searching to track them down....

I do know where you can start, though. If you make a dozen cases of %colo_coffee_caramel_truffles% - this is the last recipe I have, and I'll give it to you now - and bring them to %sydmint%, %sydmintkeep% will hand over the recipe for Deiter's favorite treats.
Bring a dozen cases of %colo_coffee_caramel_truffles% to %sydmintkeep% in %sydney%.
Rowena said something about you bringing me a dozen cases of %colo_coffee_caramel_truffles%...
You come bearing gifts of %colo_coffee_caramel_truffles%? Yes, Rowena mentioned you to me, <player>. You're really trying to patch things up around here, aren't you?
Well, I do indeed have Deiter's favorite recipe here, for %milk_blend_truffles%. You've got quite a list of ingredients to source. Go see him once you've got 50 cases on hand.
Go see %istshopkeep% in %istanbul% once you've got 50 cases of %milk_blend_truffles% on hand.
Nothing would make me happier than to receive a gift from my sister Rowena...
50 cases of %milk_blend_truffles% - a gift from Rowena? What a wonderful surprise! You know, ever since she and Grimaldo split up, she's been just absolutely charming.
Go see %accramarketkeep% in %accra%. Tell him I sent you for the recipe for Felix's favorite Truffles.
You were sent by Deiter? I know what you're after - let me find the recipe for you.....
Here it is - the coveted Baumeister recipe for %blend_mint_coffee_truffles%. 50 cases of these will be most appreciated by Felix. Of that, you can be sure.
Find %trinparkkeep% once you've got 50 cases of %blend_mint_coffee_truffles% produced.
Nothing would make me happier than to receive a gift from my sister Rowena...

Rowena has sent 50 cases of %blend_mint_coffee_truffles%? Wherever did you find the recipe, my friend? Next you really should take some chocolates to Jarrah. %blend_raspberry_coconut_truffles% are his favorite. Last I heard, the recipe was somewhere in %newyork%.....
Search in %newyork% for Jarrah's favorite recipe.

You want the whole story, do you? I started out, just like you, an apprentice of Evangeline's. Was doing quite well, until Rowena entered the picture. It was I who helped cause the rift between Evangeline and Jarrah. If this can help make amends, I am more than happy to oblige. I'll give you the recipe to Jarrah's favorites, you take care of the rest.
I don't mean to appear greedy, but I was led to believe that there may be a gift in the works from %sydshopkeep%?

Oh my goodness, <player>. These are simply my favorite treats. Rowena must really be trying to turn over a new leaf. The next time you find yourself in %sydney%, please tell her that she has my blessing.

I am so, so happy that everything is going so well. At this point, I am pleased to give you my shop. Now, it seems that there is just one more person I need to convince - my eldest sister, Evangeline. I have held on to the recipe for her favorite chocolates for all these years. I gave it to %sydquaykeep% here in town for safe keeping. Tell her I sent you for it...
See %sydquaykeep% for the recipe that she has been holding for Rowena.
You are looking for %sydquaykeep%? She can be found in %sydney% at the %sydquay%.
Wow, this recipe hasn't been used in an age. Best of luck to you, <player>, your cause is a noble one.
Bring %sftutor% 100 cases of %exdark_blend_truffles% from her sister.
Nothing would make me happier than to receive a gift from my sister Rowena...

You have 100 cases of %exdark_blend_truffles%, a gift from my sister Rowena? This can mean only one thing - our feud is over. <player>, do you realize all that you have done for me? I have Jarrah, I have my family, the honor of our recipes has been restored. For you, too, I have some news....

You have achieved the rank of %rank_4%! The title is well earned - you truly are a master of the craft. <player>, you have succeeded where many before you have failed - I offer you my utmost respect and congratulations!
You have made my life complete again. I wish you nothing but good fortune as you continue to build on your successes!
Oh, <player>. Evangeline and I will be together again - after all this time! I owe it all to you, my friend!

Greetings. I understand that you're down on your luck, <player>. I'm always here to help a Chocolatier in need. Would you like to borrow $1000 for a few weeks? If so, I'll expect to be repaid - with interest. After a month or so, you'll owe me $1200. Don't worry, I'll find you. Do we have a deal?
Just a reminder - you owe me $1200. I'll be seeing you around...
You do recall that you have certain obligations, yes. I'll take that $1200 off your hands; it has been a pleasure doing business with you.

Howdy, <player>. Looks like you've gotten yourself into another pinch. As I said, I'm always here to help a Chocolatier in need. But this time, my fee has gone up. I'll gladly loan you $1000. But, you will need to repay me $1500. Don't worry, I'll find you. Do we have a deal?
Just a reminder - you owe me $1500. I'll be seeing you around...
I'll take that $1500 now. Always a pleasure doing business with you. See you around...
Well hello again, <player>. Another pickle, I see? As you know, I'm here to help. I'd loan you another $1000. And again, you will owe me $1500. Deal?
Just a reminder - you owe me $1500. I'll be seeing you around...
Listen, <player>. I'm going to take that $1500 you owe me. You should mind your finances - I'll be willing to loan you money again - but my interest rate is going up. Good luck...
I get the feeling you are having some trouble managing your finances. I'm happy to help, but my interest rate is now higher. I will loan you $1000, but you must repay me $2000. What do you say?
Just a reminder - you owe me $2000. I'll find you...
Well hello there, <player>. I'll take that $2000 we agreed to earlier. Fare thee well!

My, word, <player>. You are really building a magnificent chocolate empire! I would like to offer you a Corporate Airship - owning this will reduce all travel times by half. More importantly, all of your travel for the rest of the game will cost you nothing. For $250,000, you'll really be traveling in style. Shall I inflate it for you?
Now traveling first class, all the time, with a Corporate Airship.
Wonderful! You have made a good decision. Your Airship will be ready for you for your next journey. Bon Voyage!
A warehouse fire in <port> has driven up the price of <ing>!
The producers of <ing> in <port> are on strike! Prices are up.
Demand is high for <ing> in <port> this season. Prices are up.
Bad storms off the coast have clearly affected prices. You should expect a high price for <ing> in <port> for a while.
The price of <ing> is way up in <port> right now - must be having supply troubles, I guess.
If you're in the market for <ing>, I suggest heading anywhere but <port> - the price is way up there right now.
A supply ship has sunk, and as a result the price of <ing> is through the roof in <port>.
If you have <prod> to sell, head for <port> - they're commanding quite the price there of late.
Consumers in <port> can't seem to get enough <prod>, and they are driving the price way up.
Judging from their price there, something about <prod> has sure tickled the fancy of <port> consumers.
It seems that <prod> are all the rage in <port> this season, and their prices reflect the growing demand.
Let's just say that I have it on good authority that <prod> will command top dollar in <port> for a while yet.
If you're looking for a good deal on <ing> be sure to visit <port> soon…
There are some amazing bargains to be had in <port> this season. It seems demand is way off for <ing> there.
It is not complicated. Producers are simply over-supplying these days. You can take advantage of a great price on <ing> in <port>, if you hurry.
I can't speak for other places, but you'll get a great deal on <ing> in <port> for the time being.
The price of <ing> is dropping fast in <port> right now - the market must be saturated.
Don't let this get around, but the price is down for <prod> in <port>.
There's no accounting for taste, is there? Consumers simply aren't willing to pay top dollar for <prod> in <port> these days.
I was just in <port>, and I noticed that the price seemed very low for <prod>.
If you've got <prod>, I'd go somewhere other than <port> to sell them - it seems prices there are down just now.
I can't tell you the cause, in fact I wish I knew it myself, but I can tell you that the price of <prod> is way off in <port>.
A glut of <ing> on the market in <port> has dropped the price there dramatically.
Chocolate lovers in <port> are demanding more <prod> and are willing to pay.
<prod> are not selling well in <port>, and prices are dropping there.
